# Tools {#sec-tools}


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
```
:::



## Air Quality

@fig-airquality further explores the impact of temperature on ozone level. 
See @sec-accuraccy for more information on accuracy.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(airquality, aes(Temp, Ozone)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "loess")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Temperature and ozone level.](tools_files/figure-html/fig-airquality-1.png){#fig-airquality width=672}
:::
:::
